short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables collapsing and expanding of rows in a Novulo trace and highlights slow process actions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the add-on enabled you can analyse a Novulo trace file more easily by using the buttons on the top right corner of the screen and the expand/collapse buttons on some rows.

Furthermore, you can inspect elements in a Novulo application, like fields, buttons and grids to learn more about their origin and their data base field name, if applicable.

Visit the following website to view a demo "Novulo Trace" and to test the add-on.
Successful Trace: https://joachimbatzke.com/addons/DemoTrace.axd.htm
Error Trace: https://joachimbatzke.com/addons/Demo2Trace.axd.htm
